p: Retained intracytoplasmic nanoformulations consisting of a hydrophobic and lipophilic modified dolutegravir prodrug encapsulated into poloxamer released the drug from macrophages and suppressed viral replication and spread of virus to CD4 + T cells, while the drug blood and tissue levels in BALB/cJ mice were above 64 ng/mL corresponding to IC 90 value for 56 and 28 days, respectively (Sillman et al. 2018).
